resources.string: Click an animal to learn more!
Which animal has two toes on each hoof?

string.name: cow_fun
string.i: * Cows have a memory that lasts for about three years! \n* Cows recognize their names!

string.name: pig_fun
string.i: * Pigs are the 4th most intelligent animal in the world! \n* Pigs can run up to 11 miles per hour!

string.name: chicken_fun
string.i: * Chickens are the closest living relative of the T-Rex! \n* Some types of chickens can lay blue or green eggs!

string.name: horse_fun
string.i: * Horses sleep standing up! \n* Horses have the largest eyes of any land animal!

string.name: goat_fun
string.i: * Goats are great swimmers! \n* Goats have rectangular pupils which allow them to see in the dark!

string.name: sheep_fun
string.i: * Sheep have two toes on each hoof!\n* An adult female sheep produces enough wool annually to make a suit!
